body_html:
I updated the commit with a small modification. The script first checks whether MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET has been defined and exported, if not, then defines and exports it.

This way someone would have the option to populate it with a custom value prior to invoking the script.
body_text:
I updated the commit with a small modification. The script first checks whether MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET has been defined and exported, if not, then defines and exports it.
This way someone would have the option to populate it with a custom value prior to invoking the script.
body:
I updated the commit with a small modification. The script first checks whether `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET` has been defined and exported, if not, then defines and exports it.

This way someone would have the option to populate it with a custom value prior to invoking the script.
